# Exception Handling

> Documentation for Exception Handling.

*Topics available: 7*

- [Exception Types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/exception-handling/exception-types.md): Learn how to define and use F# exception types.
- [Exception Handling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/exception-handling/index.md): Learn the basics of exception handling in F# and find links to exception handling expressions and functions.
- [Exceptions: The failwith Function](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/exception-handling/the-failwith-function.md): Learn how the 'failwith' function generates an F# exception.
- [Exceptions: The invalidArg Function](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/exception-handling/the-invalidArg-function.md): Learn how the F# 'invalidArg' function generates an argument exception.
- [Exceptions: raise and reraise functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/exception-handling/the-raise-function.md): Learn how the F# 'raise' and 'reraise' functions are used to indicate that an error or exceptional condition has occurred.
- [Exceptions: The try...finally Expression](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/exception-handling/the-try-finally-expression.md): Learn how the F# 'try...finally' expression enables you to execute clean-up code even if a block of code throws an exception.
- [Exceptions: The try...with Expression](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/exception-handling/the-try-with-expression.md): Learn how to use the F# 'try...with' expression for exception handling.
